title: Direct Request (&#x27;Forced Browsing&#x27;)
overview: Web applications susceptible to direct request attacks often make the false assumption that such resources can only be reached through a given navigation path and so only apply authorization at certain points in the path.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design Operation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Apply appropriate access control authorizations for each access to all restricted URLs, scripts or files.::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Consider using MVC based frameworks such as Struts.::
